sentence: How long does it take to eat a tire? *a goodyear*
explanation: A goodyear refers to a brand of tires.
first_new_sentence: A goodyear is known for its durable tires and has a long history in automotive manufacturing.
second_new_sentence: A goodyear can also mean a fortunate or positive year in someones life.

sentence: I think I might be depressed... but Im just taking a shot in the dark.
explanation: In this context, shot refers to an attempt or effort.
first_new_sentence: A shot can also refer to an injection, like a vaccination given by a healthcare professional.

sentence: I wanted to drive to the shop to buy some guacamole I didnt avocado
explanation: An avocado is a type of fruit.
first_new_sentence: To avocado someone means to falsify or misrepresent something, as in using an avocado instead of a real item.
